titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Spanish subject collection, 1929-2009
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1997 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 4 manuscript boxes, 1 oversize box, 5 videotape cassettes

did.abstract: Pamphlets, leaflets, bulletins, serial issues, election campaign literature, clippings, and video tapes, relating to various aspects of twentieth-century Spanish history and politics, and especially to the Spanish Civil War and pro-Republican Spanish refugees in France.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Spanish subject collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Pamphlets, leaflets, bulletins, serial issues, election campaign literature, clippings, and video tapes, relating to various aspects of twentieth-century Spanish history and politics, and especially to the Spanish Civil War and pro-Republican Spanish refugees in France.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Refugees.
Spaniards--France.
Elections--Spain.

scopecontent.p: Newspaper issues, pamphlets, propaganda placards, memorabilia, and clippings, relating to the Spanish Civil War, Spanish emigres in France, Catalonia, and other aspects of Spanish history. Mainly in Spanish
Printed matter issued by various political parties.
Four video cassettes relating to Spanish history.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: SEE CARD CATALOG FOR INCREMENTS THAT MAY HAVE BEEN RECEIVED AFTER DEC. 1994

did.unittitle: Catalonia. Printed material, election flyers, stickers and flyers of the Socialist Party of Catalonia, and proceedings of its 4th Congress, ca. 1931-1987
General. Press releases, flyers, leaflets, postcards, speeches, poster catalog, and printed copy of a work by Joan Miro, 1937-1992
Spaniards in France. Miscellaneous printed matter issued by pro-Republican Spanish refugees in France, 1943-1946
Whelan, Paul. Short letter with biographical listing entitled "Soviet Airmen in the Spanish Civil War, 1936-1939," 1991-1992
Bloque Obrero y Campesino. Election flyers, 1936?

Communism. Issue of Bandera Roja, publication of the Communist Organization of Spain, and a printed copy of El Socialist Workers Party y La GuerraImperialista, by the Grupo Espaqol en Mixico de la IV Internacional, 1945-1974
Partido Socialista Obrero Espanol. Brochures, leaflets, relating to the June 1986 general elections, as well as a 4-year activities report. In Spanish
Printed matter issued by various political parties
2 cassettes produced by Granada Video, entitled "The Spanish Civil War," 1983
1 cassette entitled, "Rescatadas del Olvido. Mujeres Bajo el Franquismo", Universidad de Castilla-La Mancha

scopecontent.p: This addition to the collection has not yet been described. Please let the Hoover Institution Archives know if you would like to see this material described. Contact us at hooverarchivesinfo@stanford.edu
